content:
When the travel sponsorship exceeds the terminal's limit,
you will only receive the initial amount of <color=#8AAB4B>{FirstMoney} Dough</color>, though
the deposited amount may increase. Would you like to continue?

Current travel sponsorship is <color=#8AAB4B>{Money} Dough</color>,
The terminal seems to be... showing slight fluctuations,
Could it be that the travel incident code has already been activated?
